dcterms:creator: J. Colyar
J. Halkias
dcterms:description: The NGSIM I-80 dataset contains detailed vehicle trajectory data collected using synchronized digital video cameras on eastbound I-80 in Emeryville, CA. This dataset provides precise positions, velocities and other vehicle information over three 15-minute periods at 10 Hz.
dcterms:title: NGSIM I-80 dataset

dcterms:creator: F. AltchÂ´e
A. de La Fortelle
dcterms:description: The NGSIM 101 dataset contains trajectories from more than 6000 individual drivers, used for training and evaluating models for highway trajectory prediction.
dcterms:title: NGSIM 101 dataset

dcterms:creator: M. Montanino
V. Punzo
dcterms:description: The NGSIM I-80 reconstructed dataset corrects errors such as extreme acceleration and inconsistent vehicle IDs, making the data usable for studies on traffic flow theory.
dcterms:title: NGSIM I-80 reconstructed dataset
